thread.title: REMO/EFREN CUEVAS
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by REMO/EFREN CUEVAS

author: REMO/EFREN CUEVAS
title: REMO/EFREN CUEVAS
text: Seymour who took care of my travel was very helpful, respectful and very knowledgeable in the travel industry. He worked hard to find me an affordable price and the nearest airport at my convenience. He also explained in details the cost of my travel. He made sure that I understand all the procedures regarding my travel. I will definitely refer him to my friends and relatives for their travel.
